data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kabarole.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kabarole, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Kabarole.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 29,763 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kabarole, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Swahili people.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Kabarole, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 19,757 believers in Kabarole, Uganda how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Kabarole, Uganda to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

location.name: Kabarole
location.people_groups_list: Meneng, Karamojong, Arab, Lebanese, Kaliko, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Meneng (7,800), Karamojong (849,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Kaliko (13,000), Chinese, general (19,000)
